answerText: a toy drum[10] Stanley is the protagonist of the The Birthday Party, a play by this English author of Betrayal and The Dumb Waiter.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 2 | 17 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this item which Stanley Webber receives as a birthday gift in a play. It seems oddly childish for Stanley, who is last seen being taken away by Goldberg and McCann.
